# rating

**Instance Property**

The current rating that the template displays.

## Declaration

```swift
var rating: NSNumber? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] that contains a value in the range of 0 to [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPInformationRatingItem/maximumRating]. The value is an increment of 0.5.

## Accessing the Item’s Attributes

- **maximumRating**: The maximum rating that the template displays.
